ComicInfo.Summary: The new adventures of the world's most infamous celebrity superhero team continues! Is the new Youngblood a bona fide force for good... or just another marketing scheme cooked up by the U.S. government? Either way, it's time for the team to go head-to-head with their focus-tested adversaries: MAYHEM, INC! The Palms Las Vegas will never be the same!
